group_1.textLeft: It's the latest winter outfit I've tailored!
You saw the design plans earlier, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: Yes...I did view them earlier...
But back then it was covered @in all sorts of mushrooms...
No, it mustn't give such a gaudy impression...
May I ask why such a change?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it was all thanks to your advice, Ria!

group_1.textRight: M-mine, you say!?
(T-that shouldn't be the case, because...)
Kamihama Winter Fashion Contest?

group_1.textLeft: Right!
This time I'm thinking of applying @to the high school group!
I'm wanting to get a bunch of ideas together @so I can get good results...

group_1.textRight: I see, and you called me @knowing I'm an active model.

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
If I get opinions from the fashionista Ria, @then I can give it 110 percent!

group_1.textRight: Huhu, if you talk me up that much @then there's no helping it.
I'd be delighted to offer you my assistance. @Oooh ho ho ho!

group_1.narration: "This winter, oversized knits like this are in vogue."
"But, if you're entering a contest, @why not make your own stylish coordination @that rather than following trends, @aims to set them instead?"
"That way we can make use of our model's figure, @and though it's designated for high school, @will still be quite the head turner."

group_1.textLeft: I see, stylish... @Alright!
Come see my rough sketch! @The theme is cool, grown-up coordination.

group_1.textRight: Well, it is heading in the right direction.
First off, would you kindly remove the shiitake @protruding from the cuffs and shoulders?

group_1.textLeft: They're king trumpets, but... @Would it feel more stylish without them?

group_1.textRight: Yes, very much so! @Absolutely certain of it!
After that... @The overall feel of it is stuffy.
Perhaps change the jacket color from black to purple @and show a little more skin.
In doing so, I think the theme would be better @expressed.

group_1.textLeft: Understood!
Then I'll just arrange this part into something @like this...
I fixed it up using your suggestions, Ria!

group_1.textRight: Let me see...
(With my advice, the design @has become more refined.)
(And may I say,  Kanoko...)
(You are exceptional at applying the ideas of others @into your designs.)
(My opinion of you has improved a little!)

group_1.textLeft: ...How is it?

group_1.textRight: Not bad by any means.
All that's left is to accent it with a hairpin, @and it's most excellent!

group_1.textLeft: You really mean it!?

group_1.textRight: Yes, and with you as its model, @it will brim with style.
Well, for a supermodel like me @it's a little mediocre though...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much!
Because of all your help I'll make a winter outfit @that glimmers with fashion sense.

group_1.textRight: Huhu, you're welcome.
Right, could you kindly show me the outfit @once it's completed?
It does incorporate my ideas, after all...
If the presence it gives is just right, @I may even wear it for you.
(Thinking back on it, @I don't believe I said anything strange...)

group_1.textLeft: At any rate, @you were a huge help!
I finally reached this design @all thanks to your help, Ria.
No matter how much I drew, @not a thing jumped out at me,
but with the hint you left, @a major breakthrough dawned on me!

group_1.textRight: Hint...?

group_1.textLeft: Ria, you said it yourself, didn't you!?

group_1.textCenter: Well, for a supermodel like me @it's a little mediocre though...

group_1.textLeft: What you meant was... @"Don't be satisfied with a mediocre design."
"If I want to place first, @then I need to aim to reach that level!"
...That's the advice you gave!
That's why I put all my heart and soul @into coming up with this idea...
To cover it with loo~oots of colorful mushrooms!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]EHHH～～～～～～～～～！

group_1.textLeft: Nonchalantly tossing a hint at me like that... @Such fashion sense...it's so you!

group_1.textRight: (Then... This unholy abomination of a design @was due to a single word from me...)

group_1.textLeft: I think it's even up to your level, Ria!

group_1.textRight: Hie!?

group_1.textLeft: So then, please try on this outfit!

group_1.textRight: NOOOOOOOOOO~~~~!
